stem: A 20-year-old man sustained a deep laceration on the anterior aspect of the wrist. Median nerve injury would result in
opt4: An inability to oppose the thumb to other fingers
disc:
Median nerve damage at the wrist (distal injury) will result in severe restriction of movement of the thumb including the inability to oppose thumb to other fingers ('Ape hand').

Radial nerve injury will result in a wrist drop whereas ulnar nerve damage will result in a claw hand.
